channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLhealthAndWellness
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLhealthAndWellness, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trauma-focused therapy shows promise for children struggling with PTSD
item.description: A specialist form of therapy could offer hope for some of the most vulnerable young PTSD sufferers, according to a University of East Anglia study.

item.title: Processed Foods: What to Eat, What to Skip
item.description: From frozen veggies to packaged snacks, processed foods aren't all created equal. Learn how to tell the difference and spot healthier options.
